title: Anne Bogart Is Not Entirely Retiring
description: “I think that the legacy is more how we offer a model for future young companies,” Bogart said of the theater company she leads, which is ending its producing activities.
dc:creator: Elisabeth Vincentelli

media:content.media:credit: Dolly Faibyshev for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Anne Bogart onstage after SITI Company’s “War of the Worlds — The Radio Play” at the Laurie Beechman Theater.
